explains: n. 炸面包圈，甜甜圈（同 doughnut）

sentences.en: Don't think about eating that chocolate donut!
sentences.cn: 不要想着吃掉那块巧克力甜甜圈！

sentences.en: The neighboring building is naturally a donut shop.
sentences.cn: 邻近的建筑自然是甜甜圈店。

sentences.en: The average donut contains approximately 300 calories.
sentences.cn: 平均每个炸圈饼里含有接近300卡路里的热量。
